What are the treatments for Pseudohypoaldosteronism type 2 ?,How might pseudohypoaldosteronism type 2 be treated? Pseudohypoaldosteronism may be treated with thiazide diuretics and dietary restriction of sodium.,GARD,Pseudohypoaldosteronism type 2
